summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Government Way, in the City of Seattle, from the east line of Lawton Park, an addition to the City of Seattle, to 25th Avenue West; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
